::Battera:

She took a step past him and look around. She saw Rex there. She 
smiled at him. "I hope you don't mind. Firearm is giving me a small 
tour of the base.  It's a nice ship. It really is."
She looked at Rex and back at Firearm. She looked at her hands 
infront of her.  She felt a little out of place on the maximal ship.
Her being a pred an all. She looked at her symbol and back at her 
hands.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Firearm::
> 
> Firearm smiles at Battera. "I'm fine," he says, stopping near a 
door, "The 
> bridge is this way. Rex won't get mad if he knows what's good for 
him," 
> Firearm's smile turns into a grin as he waves his arm cannon 
dangeroustly. He 
> presses a button on the panel near the door, the door opening to 
reveal the 
> advanced devices on the bridge.
> 
> "Here we are," he says, leading Battera into the bridge.
